Package com.springproject.emailsender.service.impl

Class UserServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.springproject.emailsender.service.impl.UserServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserService
@Service public class UserServiceImpl extends Object implements UserService
Class that implements the UserService interface, providing the CRUD methods for user information and creating custom actions
